name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Jose A. Gambaro RESTITUYO

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
CASTILLE and NEWMAN, JJ., dissent and would reach the merits of the appeal.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Jose A. Gambaro RESTITUYO.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
CASTILLE and NEWMAN, JJ., dissent and would reach the merits of the appeal.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Mark C. Baldwin, Iva C. Dougherty, Reading, for Commonwealth.
W. Michael Trant, Reading, Jeanne Triuellini, Pine Forge, for Jose Restituyo.
casebody.head_matter:
670 A.2d 1153
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Jose A. Gambaro RESTITUYO.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 25, 1996.
Decided Feb. 13, 1996.
Mark C. Baldwin, Iva C. Dougherty, Reading, for Commonwealth.
W. Michael Trant, Reading, Jeanne Triuellini, Pine Forge, for Jose Restituyo.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
